DESCRIPTION1: Pick up a auction an start participate!
DESCRIPTION2: You can select distinct kinds of auctions, since populars,
DESCRIPTION3: to recents, besides you can search a auction by title or description. Feel free to navigate around the page.
AUCTDETAIL: You can watch your auctions, watch the auctions in which you bidded, edit your profile, your auctions, and add some new.
NEWAUCTDESCRIP: Generates a new auction so that users can compete for it. Add some date!!!
ALLAUCTDESCRIP: Look at the auctions, look at their status, select some and start participating!.
